Title: Study heroes and show action. Stand on the seaports and have the whole world in view
Designer: Worker-peasant-soldier Fine Art Creation and Study Class of the Shanghai Municipal Fine Arts University (上海市美术学校工农兵美术创作学习班)
Publisher: Shanghai renmin chubanshe (上海人民出版社)
Notes: Fang Haizhen (方海珍), heroine of the model opera On the Docks (Haigang, 海港).
